chapters.title: Chapter 39: Encounters in Samara
chapters.info: King Johanin, p. 623 (441)—King of Ghealdan when Masema started gathering followers. He considered Masema to be a harmless madman and did nothing about it, against his advisors' advice. He died in an alleged hunting accident, although Uno claimed that unless Johanin did not know one end of a boar spear from another, he was killed by the nobles who told him to put the group down. He was succeeded by Ellizelle. See also Ellizelle; Kigarin, Alliandre Maritha; Teresia.
